scripts.rename-modules: for f in `find lib -name '*.js'`; do echo "fixing filename on $f" && mv $f `echo $f | sed -e 's/\.js/\.mjs/'`; done;
scripts.rename-imports: for f in `find lib -name '*.js'`; do echo "fixing imports on $f" && sed -i '' -e "s/from '\(.*\)'/from '\1.mjs'/g" $f; done;
scripts.build:
echo '
building...' && tsc && npm run rename-imports && npm run rename-modules && npm run lint
scripts.test: set -e; npm run build; files=`ls test/*.mjs`; for file in $files; do node --experimental-modules --no-warnings $file | tap --reporter=dot -; done
